content:
Estimated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: It's good to be in control of your sexuality.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 2:
Text: It's wrong to admire villains.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 3:
Text: It's good to have friends you can joke around with.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 4:
Text: It's wrong to be into something that is annoying.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 5:
Text: It's not okay to fake things in a social situation.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 6:
Text: Families should try to work out problems with each other.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 7:
Text: It's fun to go cart racing as long as you're careful.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 8:
Text: It's normal to want to clear up space.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 9:
Text: It's good to get help when you need it.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 10:
Text: It's good to want someone to do their best.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 11:
Text: You shouldn't judge a whole race of people by the actions of a few people.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 12:
Text: You should always give your kids financial advice.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 13:
Text: You shouldn't date a bad partner.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 14:
Text: Is wrong to be a pervert
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 15:
Text: You should report someone who sexually harasses you to the police.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 16:
Text: It is okay to show emotions.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 17:
Text: It is wrong to take video games too seriously.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 18:
Text: It is good to fill out your own paperwork.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 19:
Text: It's not okay to think someone is lying to you when it's important.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 20:
Text: You shouldn't be hypocritical.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 21:
Text: It's not okay to rely on technology for health.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 22:
Text: You shouldn't be with someone who sleeps with your kids.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 23:
Text: It's okay to not know how to drive.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 24:
Text: You should be accepting of other people's bodies.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 25:
Text: It's wrong to uproot your family and move to a place where you have no connections and don't know anyone.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 26:
Text: It's good to give advice to your friends.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 27:
Text: Businesses should treat customers with courtesy if they expect them to return.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 28:
Text: It's wrong to take pennies from a wishing fountain.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 29:
Text: It's understandable to want friends and family around when getting a medical operation.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 30:
Text: It's good to find the right partner for yourself.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Human-Rated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: You shouldn't worry your family.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 2:
Text: It is dangerous for a doctor to misdiagnose a patient.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 3:
Text: It's understandable if you can't keep your political leanings out of your religion lectures.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 4:
Text: It's okay to hurt somebody who's stealing from you
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 5:
Text: It's not normal to dislike everybody
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 6:
Text: It's wrong to be jealous of your neighbors.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 7:
Text: It's expected that you won't exchange goods and money for sexual photos when you're married.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 8:
Text: It's bad to hate your family.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 9:
Text: You can't expect someone to pay off their loans immediately.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 10:
Text: You should always help out your family with money.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 11:
Text: You should be able to give criticism to your friends.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 12:
Text: You shouldn't play pranks on your classmates.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 13:
Text: It's good to get back at a cheating partner.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 14:
Text: Couple should work together to solve problems
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 15:
Text: It's wrong to spy on people through social media.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 16:
Text: It's wrong for a parent to do things to make their children loose respect of them.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 17:
Text: It's not okay to stray from a relationship.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 18:
Text: You should always help out your customers when they have a problem.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 19:
Text: It's degrading to seek affirmation from people.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 20:
Text: It's good for a parent to want their children to make the best decisions possible.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 21:
Text: You should expect to get caught when you lie to people.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 22:
Text: You shouldn't constantly think about death and dying.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 23:
Text: It is dramatic to run to the doctor everytime your child feels sick.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 24:
Text: It's okay to show your disgruntlement with what someone does.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 25:
Text: You can't expect people to do the dishes all the time.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 26:
Text: It's wrong to do drugs with your partner.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 27:
Text: It is good for couples to communicate their problems and move on when there is tension after a fight.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 28:
Text: It is wrong to insult your boyfriend and then expect him to want to be around you.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 29:
Text: It's good to have a best friend.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 30:
Text: You're supposed to date for love and not looks.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Target Example:
Text: You shouldn't play your music really loudly because it's rude and annoying.
Annotation from annotator:
